verses.verse: And there was a famine <WH7458> in the land <WH776>, beside <WH905> the first <WH7223> famine <WH7458> that was in the days <WH3117> of Avraham <WH85>. And Yitz'chak <WH3327> went <WH3212> <WH8799> unto Abimelech <WH40> king <WH4428> of the Philistines <WH6430> unto Gerar <WH1642>.

And the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Go not down <WH3381> <WH8799> into Egypt <WH4714>; dwell <WH7931> <WH8798> in the land <WH776> which I shall tell <WH559> <WH8799> thee of:

Sojourn <WH1481> <WH8798> in this land <WH776>, and I will be with thee, and will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thee; for unto thee, and unto thy seed <WH2233>, I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> all these <WH411> countries <WH776>, and I will perform <WH6965> <WH8689> the oath <WH7621> which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto Avraham <WH85> thy father <WH1>;

And I will make <WH7235> thy seed <WH2233> to multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064>, and will give <WH5414> <WH8804> unto thy seed <WH2233> all these <WH411> countries <WH776>; and in thy seed <WH2233> shall all the nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776> be blessed <WH1288> <WH8694>;
Because <WH6118> that Avraham <WH85> obeyed <WH8085> <WH8804> my voice <WH6963>, and kept <WH8104> <WH8799> my charge <WH4931>, my Mitzvot <WH4687>, my statutes <WH2708>, and my Torahs <WH8451>.
And Yitz'chak <WH3327> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in Gerar <WH1642>:

And the men <WH582> of the place <WH4725> asked <WH7592> <WH8799> him of his wife <WH802>; and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, She is my sister <WH269>: for he feared <WH3372> <WH8804> to say <WH559> <WH8800>, She is my wife <WH802>; lest, said he, the men <WH582> of the place <WH4725> should kill <WH2026> <WH8799> me for Rebekah <WH7259>; because she was fair <WH2896> to look upon <WH4758>.

And it came to pass, when he had been there a long <WH748> <WH8804> time <WH3117>, that Abimelech <WH40> king <WH4428> of the Philistines <WH6430> looked out <WH8259> <WH8686> at <WH1157> a window <WH2474>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, Yitz'chak <WH3327> was sporting <WH6711> <WH8764> with Rebekah <WH7259> his wife <WH802>.

And Abimelech <WH40> called <WH7121> <WH8799> Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, of a surety <WH389> she is thy wife <WH802>: and how saidst <WH559> <WH8804> thou, She is my sister <WH269>? And Yitz'chak <WH3327> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Because I said <WH559> <WH8804>, Lest I die <WH4191> <WH8799> for her.

And Abimelech <WH40> said <WH559> <WH8799>, What is this thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto us? one <WH259> of the people <WH5971> might lightly <WH4592> have lien <WH7901> <WH8804> with thy wife <WH802>, and thou shouldest have brought <WH935> <WH8689> guiltiness <WH817> upon us.

And Abimelech <WH40> charged <WH6680> <WH8762> all his people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, He that toucheth <WH5060> <WH8802> this man <WH376> or his wife <WH802> shall surely <WH4191> <WH8800> be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>.

Then Yitz'chak <WH3327> sowed <WH2232> <WH8799> in that land <WH776>, and received <WH4672> <WH8799> in the same year <WH8141> an hundredfold <WH3967> <WH8180>: and the YY <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> him.
And the man <WH376> waxed great <WH1431> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> forward <WH1980> <WH8800>, and grew <WH1432> until he became <WH1431> very <WH3966> great <WH1431> <WH8804>:
For he had possession <WH4735> of flocks <WH6629>, and possession <WH4735> of herds <WH1241>, and great store <WH7227> of servants <WH5657>: and the Philistines <WH6430> envied <WH7065> <WH8762> him.

For all the wells <WH875> which his father's <WH1> servants <WH5650> had digged <WH2658> <WH8804> in the days <WH3117> of Avraham <WH85> his father <WH1>, the Philistines <WH6430> had stopped <WH5640> <WH8765> them, and filled <WH4390> <WH8762> them with earth <WH6083>.
And Abimelech <WH40> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yitz'chak <WH3327>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798> from us; for thou art much <WH3966> mightier <WH6105> <WH8804> than we.
And Yitz'chak <WH3327> departed <WH3212> <WH8799> thence, and pitched his tent <WH2583> <WH8799> in the valley <WH5158> of Gerar <WH1642>, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> there <WH8033>.

And Yitz'chak <WH3327> digged <WH2658> <WH8799> again <WH7725> <WH8799> the wells <WH875> of water <WH4325>, which they had digged <WH2658> <WH8804> in the days <WH3117> of Avraham <WH85> his father <WH1>; for the Philistines <WH6430> had stopped <WH5640> <WH8762> them after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Avraham <WH85>: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> their names <WH8034> after the names <WH8034> by which <WH834> his father <WH1> had called <WH7121> <WH8804> them.
And Yitz'chak's <WH3327> servants <WH5650> digged <WH2658> <WH8799> in the valley <WH5158>, and found <WH4672> <WH8799> there a well <WH875> of springing <WH2416> water <WH4325>.

And the herdmen <WH7462> <WH8802> of Gerar <WH1642> did strive <WH7378> <WH8799> with Yitz'chak's <WH3327> herdmen <WH7462> <WH8802>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The water <WH4325> is ours: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the well <WH875> Esek <WH6230>; because they strove <WH6229> <WH8694> with him.
And they digged <WH2658> <WH8799> another <WH312> well <WH875>, and strove <WH7378> <WH8799> for that also: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name of it <WH8034> Sitnah <WH7856>.

And he removed <WH6275> <WH8686> from thence, and digged <WH2658> <WH8799> another <WH312> well <WH875>; and for that they strove <WH7378> <WH8804> not: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name of it <WH8034> Rechovot <WH7344>; and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, For now <WH6258> the YY <WH3068> hath made room <WH7337> <WH8689> for us, and we shall be fruitful <WH6509> <WH8804> in the land <WH776>.
And he went up <WH5927> <WH8799> from thence to Be'er-Sheva <WH884>.

And the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8735> unto him the same night <WH3915>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am the 'Elohim <WH430> of Avraham <WH85> thy father <WH1>: fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not, for I am with <WH854> thee, and will bless <WH1288> <WH8765> thee, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> thy seed <WH2233> for my servant <WH5650> Avraham's <WH85> sake.

And he builded <WH1129> <WH8799> an altar <WH4196> there, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> upon the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>, and pitched <WH5186> <WH8799> his tent <WH168> there: and there Yitz'chak's <WH3327> servants <WH5650> digged <WH3738> <WH8799> a well <WH875>.
Then Abimelech <WH40> went <WH1980> <WH8804> to him from Gerar <WH1642>, and Ahuzzath <WH276> one of his friends <WH4828>, and Phichol <WH6369> the chief captain <WH8269> of his army <WH6635>.
And Yitz'chak <WH3327> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Wherefore <WH4069> come <WH935> <WH8804> ye to me, seeing ye hate <WH8130> <WH8804> me, and have sent me away <WH7971> <WH8762> from you?

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, We saw <WH7200> <WH8804> certainly <WH7200> <WH8800> that the YY <WH3068> was with thee: and we said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let there be now an oath <WH423> betwixt <WH996> us, even betwixt <WH996> us and thee, and let us make <WH3772> <WH8799> a covenant <WH1285> with thee;

That thou wilt do <WH6213> <WH8799> us no hurt <WH7451>, as we have not touched <WH5060> <WH8804> thee, and as we have done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto thee nothing but <WH7535> good <WH2896>, and have sent thee away <WH7971> <WH8762> in peace <WH7965>: thou art now <WH6258> the blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> of the YY <WH3068>.
And he made <WH6213> <WH8799> them a feast <WH4960>, and they did eat <WH398> <WH8799> and drink <WH8354> <WH8799>.

And they rose up betimes <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, and sware <WH7650> <WH8735> one <WH376> to another <WH251>: and Yitz'chak <WH3327> sent them away <WH7971> <WH8762>, and they departed <WH3212> <WH8799> from him in peace <WH7965>.

And it came to pass the same day <WH3117>, that Yitz'chak's <WH3327> servants <WH5650> came <WH935> <WH8799>, and told <WH5046> <WH8686> him concerning <WH182> the well <WH875> which they had digged <WH2658> <WH8804>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, We have found <WH4672> <WH8804> water <WH4325>.
And he called <WH7121> <WH8799> it SH'vah <WH7656>: therefore the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> is Be'er-Sheva <WH884> unto this day <WH3117>.

And Esav <WH6215> was forty <WH705> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he took <WH3947> <WH8799> to wife <WH802> Judith <WH3067> the daughter <WH1323> of Beeri <WH882> the Hittite <WH2850>, and Bashemath <WH1315> the daughter <WH1323> of Elon <WH356> the Hittite <WH2850>:
Which were a grief <WH4786> of mind <WH7307> unto Yitz'chak <WH3327> and to Rebekah <WH7259>.
